i1.blurb: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Sivir''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|5|changedisplay=true|30 to 50|1;6;11;16;18}} '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds when she [[damage]]s an enemy [[champion]] with an [[Champion ability|ability]] or a [[basic attack]].
i1.name: Fleet of Foot
notes: * ''Fleet of Foot'' is not triggered by [[Summoner spell]]s or [[item]]s.

q1.blurb: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sivir''' hurls her crossblade in the target direction. Enemies in its path take {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, reduced to {{pp|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|type=non-champions hit|100 to 40|0 to 4|formula=100%-(15%*Nº of non-champions hit). ''This is capped at 40% damage at 4 enemies hit.''}}. Upon reaching maximum range the crossblade returns to her, dealing the same damage.
Each unit can be damaged only once per pass.
q1.name: Boomerang Blade
notes: * The damage reduction per unit hit does not reset back to full damage upon changing direction.
* ''Boomerang Blade'' will still return to ''Sivir'' even if she dies before it changes direction.

w1.blurb: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sivir's''' next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds bounce to nearby unaffected units, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, until none remain in [[range]].
If '''Sivir''' {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}} her target, the bounces do so as well.
leveling: {{st|Bounce Damage|{{as|{{ap|50 to 70}}% AD}}|Total Bounce Damage|{{as|{{ap|50*3 to 70*3}}% AD}}}}
w1.name: Ricochet
notes: * ''Ricochet''-enhanced basic attacks can bounce from structures onto secondary targets but not from nearby units onto structures.
* Attacks on ''Sivir's'' primary target will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s as normal but secondary targets will not be affected by any at all.
** On-hit effects on the primary target will not modify damage dealt to secondary ones.
* Since {{iis|The Black Cleaver}} armor reduction is not an [[on-hit effect]] ''Ricochet'' will apply it on each secondary target.

e1.blurb: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Sivir''' gains a {{tip|spell shield}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
If '''Sivir''' blocks an ability with this shield, she restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}.
e1.name: Spell Shield
notes: * ''Spell Shield'' can block a {{ui|Dragon}} auto attack thus preventing the damage and giving ''Sivir'' mana.
** The initial knockup when {{ui|Dragon}} is first damaged cannot be blocked.
* Even if ''Spell Shield'' blocks the first hit of a {{ai|Cosmic Binding|Bard}}, it will not block the stun after hitting the secondary target.
* It will not block the damage of {{ai|Sleepy Trouble Bubble|Zoe}} while on the ground, but it will block the ''drowsy'' debuff.

r1.blurb: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Sivir''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} while {{ai|Ricochet|Sivir}} is active.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sivir''' rallies all nearby allies for 8 seconds, granting them and herself {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays to 20% after a few seconds.
r1.name: On the Hunt
notes: * ''On the Hunt's active'' will also affect [[minion]]s.
* Allies who weren't in range when ''On the Hunt'' was cast can still gain the bonus movement speed by approaching ''Sivir''.
** The bonus will persist for the full duration even if affected allies leave ''Sivir's'' [[aura]] range.
